attributes.action: not pay the DVLA for lost/ stolen driving licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If I get robbed and my photocard driving licence is taken away from me, I still have to pay £20 to replace it.

Please can we have a fairer DVLA back, not just a money-making profit machine.

Legislation should be brought in to prevent the DVLA and similar companies doing this and getting away with it. 

Even banks do not charge for replacement cards!!!
